name: Huiwei Lu
body: My name is Huiwei Lu. I am a PhD student at Advanced System Group (ASG), State Key Laboratory of Computer Architecture, Institute of Computing Technology, Chinese Academy of Sciences. My advisors is Prof. Ninghui Sun and my co-advisor is Prof. Mingyu Chen and Prof. Guangming Tan. Here is my research group. Currently I am working as research aide of Argonne National Laboratory MCS division, my supervisor is Pavan Balaji.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
